sentence.Network_en: In the decisions we have to make about Europe, we have to defend our position very robustly indeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我们不得不做出的关于欧洲的决定中，我们确实必须非常坚决地维护我们的立场。

sentence.Network_en: These three hormones also robustly stimulated thymidine incorporation and inhibited drug - induced apoptosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 并且这三种激素有利于胸(腺嘧啶脱氧核)苷掺入和抑制药物诱导的细胞凋亡.

list.abs: authors study the design problem of observer-based robustly stable controller for time-delay systems with a class of nonlinear uncertainty .研究了一类具有非线性不确定性时带系统的基于状态观测器的鲁棒稳定控制器的设计问题。

existence of robustly optimal policy rules ., 稳定型最优政策规则的存在性.
If the economy recovers more robustly than I anticipate , spending can be cancelled., 如果经济复苏的势头比我预期的更强劲 , 可以取消支出.

entry.tran: 强健的;健壮的;坚固的;结实的
entry.def: Someone or something that is robust is very strong or healthy.

example.ex: More women than men go to the doctor. Perhaps men are more robust or worry less?...
example.tran: 看医生的女性多于男性。也许男性更强壮或者顾虑要少一些？

example.ex: We've always specialised in making very robust, simply designed machinery.
example.tran: 我们一直专注于制造极为结实耐用而且设计简单的机器。

entry.tran: (观点等)强烈的，坚定的，坚决的
entry.def: Robust views or opinions are strongly held and forcefully expressed.

example.ex: A British Foreign Office minister has made a robust defence of the agreement...
example.tran: 一位英国外交大臣坚决维护这个协议。

example.ex: He has the keen eye and robust approach needed.
example.tran: 他具备了所需的敏锐的洞察力和坚定的行事态度。
